{"id": "1180303", "question": "Khamenei out as Supreme Leader of Iran by February 28?", "conditionId": "0xd4bbf7f6707c67beb736135ad32a41f6db41f8ae52d3ac4919650de9eeb94ed8", "slug": "khamenei-out-as-supreme-leader-of-iran-by-february-28", "resolutionSource": "", "endDate": "2026-02-28T00:00:00Z", "liquidity": "266384.89285", "startDate": "2026-01-14T01:35:04.513Z", "image": "https://polymarket-upload.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/khamenei-out-as-supreme-leader-of-iran-in-2025-VNDMf5RqFLwB.jpg", "icon": "https://polymarket-upload.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/khamenei-out-as-supreme-leader-of-iran-in-2025-VNDMf5RqFLwB.jpg", "description": "This market will resolve to "Yes" if Iran's Supreme Leader, Ali Khamenei, is removed from power for any length of time between this market's creation and February 28, 2026, 11:59 PM ET.
